text: Empress Zhao Feiyan (c. 32 BC â€” 1 BC), formally Empress Xiaochen, was an empress during the Han Dynasty. Zhao Feiyan was an ordinary girl born to a poor family in Suzhou, who just happened to be spotted dancing by the Emperor who took her away to the palace. It was her dancing and beautiful figure that became her legacy. Category:30s BC births Category:1 BC deaths Category:Emperors and Empresses of China
title: Empress Zhao Feiyan
